attributes.action: Ban the sale of fireworks to public
attributes.background: Too many incidents across the country are due to fireworks from fires to animals deaths to anti social behaviour commercial fireworks need to be banned and a license to be put in place to obtain and use fireworks with the right training of health and safety and fore prevention

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891
